title: President Rajapaksa visits Bangabandhu Museum and International Buddhist Centre Dhaka
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Sudath Silva) President Mahinda Rajapaksa who is on a three day official tour in Bangladesh visited the Bangabandhu Memorial Museum in Dhaka on Tuesday morning 19 April.
